summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to automatic alarm systems; providing for turning off alarms; prohibiting false activations; requiring verification systems by monitoring companies; revising false alarm fees; requiring in-person verification on non-residential premises with frequent false alarms; changing parameters and adding new Sections 10.08.135, 10.08.140, 10.08.145, 10.08.155, 10.08.165, 10.08.168, 10.08.173, and 10.08.178 to the Seattle Municipal Code, amending Sections 10.08.150, 10.08.160, and 10.08.180, and repealing Section 10.08.170 thereof.
